description: Bills approved in parliament put Catholic-majority Portugal on a path to making euthanasia legal.
title: Portugal MPs in move to legalise euthanasia
title_page: Portugal MPs in move to legalise euthanasia - BBC News
maintext: All the parties behind the bills agreed on strict conditions for euthanasia to take place - a patient must be over 18, not suffering from a mental illness, and the request can be granted only if the patient is terminally ill and suffering unbearable pain, Reuters news agency reported.
